entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
